Package org.hawaiiframework.logging.web.filter

Class ResettableHttpServletRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.ServletRequestWrapper
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequestWrapper
        • org.hawaiiframework.logging.web.filter.ResettableHttpServletRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest, javax.servlet.ServletRequest
    public class ResettableHttpServletRequest
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequestWrapper
    HttpServletRequestWrapper that allows resetting of the input stream.

    2.0.0
    Author:
    Rutger Lubbers
